MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the CW9 postcode area of Northwich, affecting properties in East Avenue, South Drive, Grange road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  9:38PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:45AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:44PM on 14th January 2021
